title: UAV Success at Dobropole. In a decisive operation, drone teams from the 56th Separate Special Forces Battalion of the 51st Guards Army successfully eliminated a Ukrainian tank near Dobropole
text:
UAV Success at Dobropole. In a decisive operation, drone teams from the 56th Separate Special Forces Battalion of the 51st Guards Army successfully eliminated a Ukrainian tank near Dobropole
UAV Success at Dobropole
In a decisive operation, drone teams from the 56th Separate Special Forces Battalion of the 51st Guards Army successfully eliminated a Ukrainian tank near Dobropole.
After receiving intel on enemy fire, operators quickly deployed FPV drones to the reported location. Though the tank attempted to retreat, they intercepted it at the entrance to Dobropole.
With expert precision, the first strike disabled the tank's mobility, followed by a second hit damaging its engine. A third strike ignited the vehicle, confirming a successful engagement. This operation exemplifies the effective integration of drone warfare in modern combat.
Join Military Wave
